description:
This week's pick is for those of you who like tall, skinny guys. Rob has very sexy crystal blue eyes and a REALLY nice dick that is fun to watch as he strokes it because it just gets bigger and bigger.
This video was actually shot in two parts and includes two cum shots. Rob had never done anything like this, so the first time I had him over he didn't give me enough notice before he came. I had to move quickly and ended up shooting it at a bad angle. No big deal... I just invited him over the next day and made sure he was sprawled out on the bed. That way I was able to capture every last drop on film.
title: Rob
